description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Awarded Indie Game of the Month by The Go (9/09), Alien Pyramid Challenge version 1.1 is back with more levels, more mummy, and more sarcasm!  In this puzzle game, you're trapped in an ancient Egyptian pyramid with a sly mummy your only companion. Move around giant limestone blocks, dangle from perilous moving platforms, and soar from shockingly-springy springs to find your way out of each room!
